message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $8000 to us due to its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship. Considering its exceptional value, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you at a special price of $7500. This opportunity is tailored to recognize your interest and commitment. Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations or if there's any way I can assist you further.
